creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
description: lozenge-shaped with steep shoulder; segments of dark veined wood with diamond and triangle band around shoulder in lighter colored wood, ebony and ivory; lighter colored wood rings around mouth and foot
marks: Signature, Date and Sticker on bottom, incised: [Ray (obscured by sticker) / 7
medium: Ebony, pink ivory wood, tagua nut
title: Vessel
